text: 11.29: 1 Ko 8.13; 9.22Maaŋ muuŋgip, guigira Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui guma the, ana ŋkasŋka vhɨzɨrga, gu vhɨra nan ŋkasŋka vhɨzɨrga. Maaŋ muuŋgip, bigɨn thueŋ hɨv, guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma then muuŋgirim, ana rɨgɨp, tɨva mbatɨga thuen muuŋgirga, gu guigira ne suaŋv vhega mbatɨgar muunga.
